text: Dumbo is an American fantasy adventure movie. It was directed by Tim Burton. It was inspired by Walt Disney's 1941 animated movie also called Dumbo. It stars Colin Farrell, Michael Keaton, Danny DeVito, Eva Green, Alan Arkin and Roshan Seth. The movie was released in the United States and United Kingdom on March 29, 2019. It was released in Real D 3D and IMAX 3D. ==References== Category:2019 movies Category:2010s American adventure movies Category:2010s American fantasy movies Category:Disney movie remakes Category:Movies about animals Category:Movies about animal cruelty Category:Movies about bullying Category:Movies about elephants Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in circuses
title: Dumbo (2019 movie)
